name: Cube Quest (Orange09)
description:
The Gem Lord reigns supreme over the four worlds filled with difficult traps and puzzles.  One orange cube sets out to prove itself to the Gem Lord and achieve glory.  Jump your way through the vast levels to make your way to the Gem Lord!  

Controls:

W= Move Forward (Up Key)

A= Move Left, (Left Key)

S= Move Down (Down Key)

D= Move Right (Right Key)

Space Bar= Jump

Q= Move Camera Left

E= Move Camera Right 

M= Open Pause Menu (Level Only)

L= Open Level Select (Main Menu Only)
